name: Umurangi Generation: Macro
summary:
Due to the surface being in constant chaos and uncertainty many of the worlds elite were able to secure themselves comfort from the ongoing crisis above. A new area, Tauranga Underground City has been added, which opens up the following 3 stages for photography:

・Gamers Palace:
Forget your worries in a top of the line Gaming Bar and VR Arcade.
・UN Hangar:
Uncover the truth the UN doesn’t want you to know.
・The Depths:
A tent city where the air is thick with the smell of grease and toxic sludge.
